00020 
00021 // This class wraps the MonotonicSet and provides easier access for a constraint.
00022 
00023 // Everything is in the set to begin with.
00024 // It's like an array of bits, it is allowed to set a 1 to 0 - but not vice versa.
00025 
00026 class ReversibleMonotonicSet
00027 {
00028 private:
00029     MonotonicSet & MS;
00030     int offset;
00031     
00032     D_DATA(int size);
00033     
00034 public:
00035     // The constructor must be called before the monotonicset is locked.
00036     ReversibleMonotonicSet(StateObj * stateObj, int _size) : MS(getMemory(stateObj).monotonicSet())
00037   #ifndef NO_DEBUG  
00038     , size(_size)
00039   #endif
00040     {
00041         D_ASSERT(&getMemory(stateObj).monotonicSet() !=NULL);
00042         D_ASSERT(size>=0);
00043         offset=MS.request_storage(_size);
00044         D_DATA(cout << "Set up ReversibleMonotonicSet with size "<< _size << " and offset " << offset <<endl);
00045     }
00046     
00047     bool isMember(int ref)
00048     {
00049         D_ASSERT(ref<size && ref>=0);
00050         return MS.isMember(ref+offset);
00051     }
00052     
00053     void remove(int ref)
00054     {
00055         D_ASSERT(ref<size && ref>=0);
00056         MS.ifMember_remove(ref+offset);
00057     }
00058     
00059     void unchecked_remove(int ref)
00060     {
00061         D_ASSERT(ref<size && ref>=0);
00062         MS.unchecked_remove(ref+offset);
00063     }
00064 };
00065 
00066 
00067 class ReversibleMonotonicBoolean
00068 {
00069 private:
00070     MonotonicSet & MS;
00071     int offset;
00072 public:
00073     // The constructor must be called before the monotonicset is locked.
00074     ReversibleMonotonicBoolean(StateObj * stateObj) : MS(getMemory(stateObj).monotonicSet())
00075     {
00076         offset=MS.request_storage(1);
00077         #ifndef NO_DEBUG
00078         cout << "Set up ReversibleMonotonicSet with size "<< 1 << " and offset " << offset <<endl;
00079         #endif
00080     }
00081     
00082     inline bool isMember()
00083     {
00084         return MS.isMember(offset);
00085     }
00086     
00087     inline void remove()
00088     {
00089         MS.ifMember_remove(offset);
00090     }
00091     
00092     inline void unchecked_remove()
00093     {
00094         MS.unchecked_remove(offset);
00095     }
00096 };
